name: Infrastructure Namespace Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate
User Namespace Volumes Full in Week Based on Daily Use Rate
Running PVCs Above % Used Warning Threshold
queries: count (max by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes ) and (max by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes )) / (max by (persistentvolumeclaim,namespace) (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes )) >= ($pvc_percent_used_warning_threshold / 100)) or vector (0)
